text: One thing I do is take advantage of template partials, that way I can have some sort of separation and sanity for stuff like topic pages, author pages, etc

curious how many people staged a page as a blank page vs a clone.  Cant count the times i rushed and accidentally staged a blank page when i wanted a clone.  if i am in the minority, i guess defaulting to selecting blank is good, but otherwise; i think it should default to clone
seen clients do this. Worse though Iâ€™ve seen them create new pages in staging vs staging the existing page they mean to replace.
